30.name: Fish Slayer
30.description: Gut the scaly swimmers to catch an achievement this big.

62.name: Torch Master
62.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a torch.

80.name: A Friend In Deed
80.description: You came to the aid of another race under threat by the dragons.
80.requirement: Complete the story step "Attempted Deicide," "Evacuation," "Set to Blow," "The Lost Chieftain's Return," or "Unholy Grounds."

81.name: This Far, No Further
81.description: You liberated Claw Island from the undead and swore to strike back at the heart of Orr.

134.name: Local Hero
134.description: A true hero takes time from slaying dragons to help out the common folk as well.

226.name: Daily Kill Variety
226.requirement: Different families or groups of enemies killed.

267.name: Magus
267.description: Fire, earth, air, water? All of the above!

271.name: Phantom
271.description: Your enemies are shrouded in misery.

594.name: Southsun Islet Sample Collection
594.description: Collect a sample from the islet across Southsun Strait.

705.name: Speedy Sprinter
705.requirement: Place among the top three racers in Sanctum Sprint.

741.name: Gnashblade Supporter
741.description: He couldn't have done it without you.

787.name: Black Citadel Agent
787.requirement: Represent the Black Citadel in the Crown Pavilion. Escort charr emissaries to hot-air balloons.

825.name: Portal Component Procurer
825.requirement: Retrieve the three components Emissary Vorpp needs to construct a portal.

828.name: Swift Closer
828.requirement: Help to end one of Scarlet's invasions of Gendarran Fields in under 10 minutes total.

865.name: Associate of Secrets, World 2
865.requirement: Find every hidden room (excluding furniture shops) in World 2, Zone 1.

bits.text: Where water crashes down at the wide river.
Does the log have other secrets?

892.name: Boss Week: Here Be Dragons!
892.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter, or any other world boss encounter,  times.

944.name: Grandmaster Chef
944.requirement: Reach rating  in the chef discipline.

1146.name: Fractal Fortnight: Thaumanova
1146.description: Thaumanova melted down, but you didn't.
1146.requirement: You've completed the Thaumanova Reactor fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1259.name: The Bells of Wintersday
1259.requirement: Complete songs in Bell Choir Ensemble.

1284.name: Wintersday Skritt Hit IV
1284.description: Give those stealers a snowball sandwich.
1284.requirement: Hit  skritt with snowballs anywhere in Tyria.

1285.name: Winter Wonderland Winner IV
1285.description: Make a run for some holiday cheer.
1285.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle.

1288.name: Winter Wonderland Winner V
1288.description: Make a run for some holiday cheer.
1288.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle.

1398.name: The Northern Gambit
1398.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1398.requirement: Participate in retaking the northern rally point.

1526.name: Pile of Parts
1526.requirement: Participate in an assault knight event.

1575.name: Boss Blitz: Slaughter Sparcus
1575.requirement: Defeat Sparcus Firesplash during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

1588.name: Ready, Willing, and Able
1588.requirement: Participate in  crystal collection or Flying Dolyak race event in the Labyrinthine Cliffs.

1621.name: Twice-Told Legend
1621.description: Some legends are so great, they must be experienced twice.

1631.name: Llama Drama
1631.description: Strut your stuff as a llama.
1631.requirement: Get transformed into a llama by the Skritt Burglar in Dry Top.

1651.name: Buried Treasure: Uplands
1651.requirement: Find and open  buried locked chest in the Treadrock Uplands, Uplands Oasis, or Unswept Uplands.

1681.name: Birthdayâ€”Year 1
1681.description: You have a character that is more than 1 year old.

1691.name: Untouched by Maw and Claw
1691.requirement: Complete "The World Summit" while avoiding all breath and claw attacks.

1722.name: Sorrow's Embrace Collector
1722.requirement: Use tales of dungeon delving from Sorrow's Embrace to unlock all  weapon and armor skins in your wardrobe.

1741.name: Ley Line Weapon Collection
1741.description: <c=@flavor>Don't get TOO caught up in the magic of Ley Lines. It could get painfulâ€”just ask Drooburt.</c>
1741.requirement: Unlock all  Ley Line weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1781.name: Luminescent Shoulderguard
1781.requirement: Collect the  parts required to assemble Luminescent Shoulderguards.

1791.name: No Thanks to Canach
1791.requirement: Complete Caithe's Reconnaissance Squad without planting any of Canach's mines.

1792.name: Better Red Than Dead
1792.requirement: Defeat the facet of light without using blue or green attunements.

1806.name: Silver and Gold
1806.requirement: Defeat Champion Mordrem Teragriff Silver and Champion Mordrem Teragriff Gold. Active during The Breach after Pact Assault Preparations has been fully completed.

1837.name: Daily Ascalon Lumberer
1837.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1837.requirement: Gathering raw materials by harvesting trees in the following Ascalon maps: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise.

1884.name: Daily Vexa's Lab Minidungeon
1884.requirement: Complete the Vexa's Lab minidungeon in Fireheart Rise.

1896.name: Daily Shattered Ice Ruins Jumping Puzzle
1896.requirement: Complete the Shattered Ice Ruins jumping puzzle in Frostgorge Sound.

2099.name: Daily Ranger or Mesmer Winner
2099.requirement: Win  PvP match as a ranger or mesmer.

2127.name: Glutton for Guidance
2127.description: You received some career advice, and you ate it up.
2127.requirement: Take in the employment pamphlet dispensed by Hero-Tron in Lion's Arch.

2128.name: Lion's Arch Exterminator
2128.requirement: Find Turl Sharptooth in the Commodore's Quarter, and use one of his special rifles to deal with the karka hatchling infestation.

2132.name: I've Seen Things
2132.requirement: Hear Ela Makkay's summary of Scarlet's War during the episode "The Battle for Lion's Arch" or in Lion's Arch.

2161.name: Candy Corn Crusher
2161.requirement: Defeat the Grand High Viscount of Candy Corn in Mad King's Labyrinth.

2182.name: Adept Reaper
2182.requirement: Begin training the necromancer's reaper elite specialization.

2185.name: Rally to Maguuma
2185.requirement: Rally with your allies in Maguuma.

2247.name: Daily Recommended Fractalâ€”Scale 3
2247.requirement: Complete  scale 3 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2249.name: "Glory of Tyria" Strongbox
2249.requirement: Search in the Noble Ledges area for the strongbox from the "Glory of Tyria."

2395.name: Master Chronomancer
2395.requirement: Completely train the mesmer's chronomancer elite specialization.

2445.name: On Wings of Gold: Gold
2445.requirement: Deliver collected shield anomalies by gliding near the collection device.

2487.name: Adept Scrapper
2487.requirement: Begin training the engineer's scrapper elite specialization.

2495.name: Whisper's Secret
2495.requirement: Unlock all  Whisper's Secret weapon and armor skins.
2495.locked_text: Purchase an Order of Whispers Equipment Guide from Order of Whispers weapon and armor merchants in the Chantry of Secrets.

2535.name: Kamohoali'i Kotaki III: Carcharias
2535.description: The sea is wide and mighty, and conceals both great dangers and wondrous prizes. Dive into it, explore its depths, and swim deep beneath its ever-shifting surface in your journey to create the legendary precursor known as Carcharias.

bits.text: Dive into the water using diving goggles near Bloody Bill's Base in Bloodtide Coast.
Dive off the bridge using diving goggles in Caledon Forest.
Dive into the ocean using diving goggles near the Buried Archives of Cursed Shore.
Dive into the ocean using diving goggles at the Cathedral of Verdance in Cursed Shore.
Dive into the ocean using diving goggles at the Sculptor's End in Malchor's Leap.
Dive off the airship using diving goggles at Fort Trinity in Straits of Devastation.
Dive into the water using diving goggles near the Vizier's Tower in Straits of Devastation.
Dive into the ocean using diving goggles in the Shattered Ice Ruins of Frostgorge Sound.
Recover the treasure on the sunken ship in Bloodtide Coast.
Recover one of the sunken weapon crates in the Sanguine Bay of Bloodtide Coast.
Sink the Ash Horizon in Sparkfly Fen and then examine the wreckage.
Recover the sunken treasure from the Wreck of the Argent Warrior in Sparkfly Fen.
Take a souvenir from the Ancient Coffer at the Plaza of Lost Wisdom in Straits of Devastation.
Looted from the Grand Chest at the bottom of the Ship of Sorrows in Straits of Devastation.
Pick up a starfish in the waters of the Strait of Sacrilege in the Straits of Devastation.
Pick up an anchor in the waters of the Shark's Teeth Archipelago in the Straits of Devastation.
Take the long way around to loot this from the Grand Chest near Fryxx in Straits of Devastation.
Looted from the Orrian Chest in the Upsilon Test Facility in Malchor's Leap.
Pried off of a sunken shipwreck, deep down in the northern waters of Malchor's Leap.
Looted from the Inquest base under Jinx Isle in Malchor's Leap.
Looted from Champion Captain Cork in Malchor's Leap.
Find the jewel hidden in the Harbinger shipwreck in Malchor's Leap.
Taken from the risen quaggan village in the Drowned Brine of Malchor's Leap.
Scraped from the wreckage in the Mausollus Sea in Cursed Shore.
Hidden among the ruins of Sunken Droknah in Mount Maelstrom.
Harvested from the large bed of kelp near Judgment Rock in Mount Maelstrom.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2569.name: Machined Axe
2569.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Axe.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2573.name: Bronzer
2573.description: It won't turn your skin orange, unless you already are...
2573.requirement: Earn a bronze medal or better on all 5 adventures in Verdant Brink.

2587.name: Conservation of Resources
2587.requirement: Keep the turret operational during the night attack.

2589.name: New Horizons
2589.requirement: Follow the trail of clues left behind by Kalla and Poskk to access the hidden lab in Rata Novus.

2627.name: City of Hope
2627.requirement: Prove yourself to gain access to a forgotten refuge.

2650.name: Plasma Weapon Collection
2650.requirement: Unlock all  Plasma weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2653.name: Undefeated
2653.requirement: Defeat all bosses in Spirit Vale without any party members dying.

2669.name: League Revenantâ€”Recruit
2669.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Professionalâ€”Recruit achievement.
2669.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as a revenant.

2684.name: League Conquerorâ€”Champion
2684.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension III: Monument of Legends.

2691.name: League Elementalistâ€”Champion
2691.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Professionâ€”Champion achievement.
2691.requirement: Win 7 ranked matches as an elementalist.

2872.name: Course Work: Super Adventure Festival
2872.requirement: Complete three daily achievements in Super Adventure Box. Completion will earn progress in the Course Load achievement, located in the Super Adventure Box: Nostalgia achievement tab.

2925.name: Daily Tier 3 Uncategorized
2925.requirement: Complete Uncategorized at fractal scale 51 or higher.

3059.name: Reaper of Magic
3059.requirement: Journey through Bloodstone Fen seeking the secrets of Unbound Magic.

3303.name: Ascension Captured
3303.requirement: Participate as a member of a team that captures an Orb of Ascension and wins the match in rated Spirit Watch  time.

3385.name: Monsters of the Forest
3385.requirement: Participate as a member of a team that kills a forest monster and wins a rated match in the Forest of Niflhel  time.

3419.name: Daily Draconis Mons Fire Orchid Posy

3420.name: People Watching
3420.description: You have to get the perfect angle.
3420.requirement: Plant scanners for the Whispers agent.

bits.text: Find the missing golem and learn the password.
Find the Whispers agent, give him the password, and obtain the scanners.
This scanner should overlook the mercenary base.
This scanner should be atop a high tree.
This scanner should overlook the Inquest camp.
This scanner should watch Tennon and Tinderbough.
This scanner should overlook the mercenary submarine.
This scanner should watch the spiders from a stalactite.
This scanner should watch the mercenary leader.

3435.name: Taimi's Pet Project
3435.requirement: Observe Taimi's new magical device, and prepare for an unwelcome visitor.

3487.name: Master Storyteller
3487.requirement: Complete all the parables of the gods.

3599.name: Up in Arms
3599.description: One step closer to your own private army.
3599.requirement: Create makeshift weapons for the unarmed villagers of Zephyr's Trace in Destiny's Gorge.

3671.name: Desert Highlands Insight: Base of the Watchtower
3671.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desert Highlands.

3701.name: Elon Riverlands Insight: Sovereign Ridge
3701.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Elon Riverlands.

3759.name: Acrid Springs Recovery
3759.description: The miners of Acrid Springs are long gone, but old coins still litter the ruined worksite.
3759.requirement: Recover sulfur-worn coins from the ruins of Acrid Springs.

3774.name: Junundu Whisperer
3774.description: If you successfully lure in three junundu, the whole clew will arrive.
3774.requirement: Keep the six junundu alive while destroying all of the siege engines in the Shattered Ravines.

3778.name: Vlast from the Past
3778.requirement: Collect all of Vlast's scattered memory crystals.

3872.name: Juaruadun the Flawless
3872.requirement: Successfully answer all of the riddles posed by the earth djinn Juaruadun the Flawless.

3959.name: Rest in Peace
3959.requirement: Defeat the Champion Mordant Crescent Graveraiser in Champion's Dawn.

3960.name: Istan Dives
3960.requirement: Find  diving goggles in the Domain of Istan.

bits.text: Find and use the goggles on the captain's ship in the Corsair Flotilla.
Find and use the goggles in the Modri Caverns.
Find and use the goggles in Champion's Dawn.
Find and use the goggles above the Ancient Royal Docks.

4055.name: (Annual) Frozen Footrace
4055.requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Wintersday in under 5 minutes without using a mount. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4075.name: (Annual) Celestial Challenger
4075.requirement: Open the final chest of the Celestial Challenge in Divinity's Reach. This achievement can be completed once a year.

4102.name: Tales of Elona
4102.requirement: Listen to Ewyn's story at his retreat.

4184.name: Riches Unveiled
4184.requirement: In the Deepstone fractal, discover all 10 hidden treasure chests in one run.

4188.name: Glory Hog
4188.requirement: Plant seeds at all the locations before Canach has a chance to help.

4326.name: Master of Markets
4326.requirement: Trade with vendors in the Labyrinthine Cliffs for Zephyrite Supply Boxes, and open the boxes.

4401.name: No More Mr. Fungi
4401.description: Just because they don't really exist doesn't mean you can't try to kill 'em.
4401.requirement: Take down a few of your hallucinations.

4411.name: Jahai Insight: Scar Overlook
4411.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Jahai Bluffs.

4445.name: (Annual) Pumpkin Carving
4445.requirement: Find pumpkins all around Tyria and carve them. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4556.name: Chasing Tales: Mosa the Majestic
4556.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood short bow and perform tasks to re-create Mosa's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Mosa the Majestic.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mosa: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mosa: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Mosa: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Mosa at a heroic font.

4581.name: The Ironhammer Throne
4581.description: Who sits on the Ironhammer throne?

4605.name: Thunderhead Peaks Treasure
4605.requirement: Open 24 dwarven chests within Thunderhead Peaks.

4657.name: Helpful Hero
4657.requirement: While a rift is closing, escape through a portal with a lost keepsake and return it to its owner.

4681.name: Skyscale Rider: Elona
4681.description: Crystal Oasis, Desert Highlands, Elon Riverlands, the Desolation, and Domain of Vabbi
4681.requirement: Complete all of the Reality Rifts in the Crystal Desert.

4705.name: Hat Trick
4705.requirement: Defeat / legendary creatures during the final assault against Kralkatorrik in Dragonfall.

4714.name: Newborn Skyscales
4714.requirement: Something is wrong with the skyscales.

bits.text: Return to Gorrik in Dragonfall after collecting the scales and medicine.
Return to Gorrik in Dragonfall after administering medicine to the skyscales.
Return to Gorrik in Dragonfall after collecting all the skyscale eggs.

4745.name: Riding Skyscales
4745.requirement: Learn to fly on your skyscale.
4745.locked_text: Unlocks a short time after completing the Troublesome Skyscales collection.

bits.text: Talk to Gorrik in Sun's Refuge.
Meet Gorrik on a bluff just to the northeast of the Fortress of Jahai in Jahai Bluffs.

4868.name: (Annual) Effigy Extinguisher
4868.description: The flame effigy appears during a bonus event upon completing a successful treasure hunt.
4868.requirement: Use water balloons scattered around the top of the Labyrinthine Cliffs to extinguish the flame effigy. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4938.name: No Ingredients Wasted
4938.requirement: Successfully prepare 10 ingredients in a row in a single event.

4993.name: Crater Circuit: Top Three
4993.requirement: Finish the Crater Circuit in the top three.

5033.name: Daily Bjora Marches Junior Investigator
5033.requirement: Assist Investigator Eleni in gathering evidence of the Jora's Keep massacre in Bjora Marches.

5067.name: Daily Bonus Rewards: Winter Wonderland
5067.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle.

5089.name: Mystery of the Bjora Marches
5089.requirement: Complete Mystery of the Bjora Marches  times.

5120.name: Mystery of the Raven Gate Ruins
5120.requirement: Complete Mystery of the Raven Gate Ruins  times.

5129.name: Bjora Marches Insight: Frozen Waterfall
5129.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in Bjora Marches.

5162.name: 2v2 Elite
5162.requirement: Finish a 2v2 mini-season in the top 250 on the skill rating leaderboard.

5179.name: Visions of the Past: Cragstead
5179.requirement: Find a memento of a past battle deep inside the village of Cragstead in Wayfarer Foothills.

5234.name: Fallen from the Summit
5234.requirement: Scour the area to retrieve intel on hostile forces in the Forging Steel and Darkrime Delves visions.

5239.name: Priority Strike: Shiverpeaks Pass
5239.requirement: Complete the Shiverpeaks Pass Strike Mission.

5246.name: Special Mission: Pillage the Mine
5246.requirement: Destroy  structures at the Vloxen Mine in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5278.name: Glory to the Blood Legion
5278.requirement:
Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.
Speak with a quaestor in any allied base to change which legion your commendations go to.

5299.name: Daily Cold War Strike
5299.requirement: Complete the Cold War Strike Mission.

5371.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Rescuer
5371.requirement: Participate in a prisoner rescue event in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

5409.name: Shiver at the Peaks
5409.description: <c=@flavor>"Are you crazy? It's colder than a lich's wit up there!"</c>
5409.requirement:
Use /shiver in the highest parts of all the Shiverpeak Mountains.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Living World episodes to complete.</c>
5409.locked_text: Learn the /shiver emote from Icebrood Saga Episode 2, "Shadow in the Ice."

5435.name: Lorekeeper Weapon Collection
5435.requirement: Unlock all  Lorekeeper weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5437.name: Daily Tier 3 Sunqua Peak
5437.requirement: Complete Sunqua Peak at fractal scale 51 or higher.

5447.name: Daily Tier 1 Sunqua Peak
5447.requirement: Completed Sunqua Peak at fractal scale 1 or higher.

5456.name: Elemental Ascent
5456.requirement: Complete the Sunqua Peak fractal on the Master tier.

5548.name: League Conquerorâ€”2v2 Season Three
5548.requirement: Win  ranked matches during 2v2 Season Three.

5644.name: Top Dragon Responder: Caledon Forest
5644.requirement: Complete  Caledon Forest Dragon Response Mission with all challenges active.

5704.name: Tide Turner: Fireheart Rise
5704.requirement: During the Dragon Response Mission, aid each recruited faction at least once while a challenge is active.

5719.name: Return to The World Summit
5719.requirement: Complete the mission The World Summit in Living World Season 2 Episode 4.

5775.name: Treasure Hunter: Challenger Cliffs
5775.requirement: Find and open  buried locked chest in Challenger Cliffs.

5796.name: Return to Cornered
5796.requirement: Complete the mission Cornered in Living World Season 2 Episode 1.

5982.name: Second Response: Thunderhead Keep
5982.requirement: Complete the Thunderhead Keep Dragon Response Mission.

6026.name: Bounty Hunter: Domain of Kourna
6026.requirement: Complete bounties within the Domain of Kourna.

6087.name: Seitung Province Insight: Shore Peaks
6087.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6091.name: Undeterred
6091.requirement: Reach the final phase without being downed.

6101.name: Time Pilot
6101.requirement: Find and scan all of the jade power cells before time runs out!

6253.name: Adept Willbender
6253.requirement: Begin training the guardian's willbender elite specialization.

6261.name: A Guardian Once More
6261.requirement: Work with Kyung to determine the fate of Zunraa.

bits.text: Find the author of "The Disappearance of Zunraa" at a shrine near the location written within.
Find a ritualist who you may call ally in Seitung Province.
What you seek waits at the heart of a puzzle shrouded in darkness.
Meet Kyung at her place of residence in the outskirts of the harbor in Seitung Province.
That which you seek sits on the shelves in a hall surrounded by water.
Learn how to harness the powers granted by the stone.
What you seek waits where light shines upon the once deceased.
What you seek waits among those that bloom within a newfound refuge.
What you seek waits among the ruins of old.
What you seek waits near the waters of familiar ruins below a bridge that ties past and present.
What you seek waits within the halls of zu Heltzer.
What you seek waits at the bottom of the shrine hidden in the trees.
What you seek waits at the crossing of respite.
What you seek waits below the waters frozen in time near abandoned solitude.
Return to Kyung's home with that which you've found.
The final step can be found where the story of that which you seek began.

6284.name: I Have Many Lure-Bound Hooks
6284.description: You can fish your whole life without understanding it was never the fish you were truly after.

6361.name: Family Values
6361.requirement: Meet everyone who lives in Joon's mansion.

6367.name: Dance like Bei Fung Is Watching
6367.requirement: Dance in front of the patrol golem just after Bei Fung boots up her cameras.

6378.name: Both Hale and Hearty
6378.requirement: Defeat the Valdhertz bosses without getting struck by their attacks more than 10 times.

6432.name: Don't Pet the Kappa
6432.requirement: Kill  kappa in New Kaineng City.

6445.name: The Haunted Court
6445.description: Spirits of fallen members of the Ministry of Purity haunt the Court of Song, so consumed by hatred that they continue to terrorize even after their own deaths. Send them to whatever gods might still have them.
6445.requirement: Defeat the spirits haunting the Court of Song.

6450.name: Daily End of Dragons Miner
6450.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
6450.requirement: Gather raw materials by mining ore in the following locations: Seitung Province, New Kaineng City, Echovald Wilds, or Dragon's End.

6523.name: Munitions Officer's Log
6523.description: It seems like he understands the plan? Maybe?

6560.name: Investigative Study 2
6560.requirement: During the Sky Pirates storyline, find and read sources of information on the Aetherblade pirates.

bits.text: Help Wanted (The Dead End Barâ€”Hard Boiled)
Letter from the Mesmer Collective (The Dead End Barâ€”Hard Boiled)
Scribbled Note from Horrik (The Aetherblade Retreat)
From E (The Dead End Barâ€”Case Closed)

6624.name: Foraging Plants
6624.requirement:
Harvest  material from resource nodes in the Ruins of Orr, Frostgorge Sound, or Southsun Cove.

<c=@reminder>Resource nodes are clumps of ore, saplings, and plants that can be gathered using gathering tools. Nodes can be found by exploring the world.</c>

6757.name: Seeking Scarlet: Twisted Marionette
6757.requirement: Complete the Twisted Marionette group meta-event, accessed from the Eye of the North, after completing the episode "The Tower of Nightmares."

6760.name: Investigative Record 2
6760.requirement: Find and listen to hidden logs from the source of the nightmares.

6817.name: League Conquerorâ€”Conquest Season Thirty-Five
6817.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Five.

6829.name: League Slayerâ€”3v3 Season Eight
6829.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 3v3 Season Eight.

6836.name: (Weekly) Stonemist Castle Conqueror
6836.requirement: Successfully capture Stonemist Castle 1 time, or defend Stonemist Castle 3 times.

6890.name: League Conquerorâ€”2v2 Season Nine
6890.requirement: Win  ranked matches during 2v2 Season Nine.

6951.name: Not Ready for Good-Bye
6951.requirement: Spend time with Caithe and Aurene.

7016.name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: Droknar's Mines
7016.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

7202.name: ...Back Again
7202.requirement: Ride a skyscale or griffon from the southern gate of the Wizard's Tower to the blue orb near the Beacon of Ages Waypoint at Wizard's Ascent in under 10 minutes without dismounting or teleporting.

7229.name: For a Rainy Day
7229.description: The wizards must have some pretty cool loot.
7229.requirement: Find all the hidden Wizard Caches throughout Amnytas.

bits.text: Some seek knowledge; others seek treasure.
Only the strong may uncover certain fortunes.
True balance is worth more than gold.
Not everything is as it seems...

7625.name: PvP Rush Champion
7625.requirement: Complete achievements in the Player vs. Player Rush category to gain champion points. More challenging achievements grant extra pointsâ€”check the achievements for details.

7643.name: League Slayerâ€”2v2 Season Ten
7643.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 2v2 Season Ten.

7684.name: Relicsâ€”Secrets of the Obscure Set 2
7684.requirement: Collect  relics from Secrets of the Obscure Relics Set 2.

bits.text: Achievement: Secrets of the Obscure: Act 4 Mastery

7772.name: Kryptis Souvenirs
7772.requirement: Collect the Kryptis weapons left behind.

7841.name: Your Majesty
7841.requirement: Kneel with Nephus to show your loyalty.

7981.name: First Journey into the Spider's Lair
7981.description: Is he king of the consumed, or is he a consumed king?
7981.requirement: Successfully defeat Eparch during the Into the Spider's Lair meta-event.

7990.name: Free Kryptis Essence: Gold
7990.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Free Kryptis Essence adventure.

8001.name: All the Feelings
8001.requirement: Gather  unique emotional attunements at least once.

8017.name: Abaddon's Mouth Veteran
8017.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8045.name: Jailbreak
8045.description: Breaking, entering, and breaking some more!
8045.requirement: Earn  progress points by defeating caretakers and breaking locks in the "Siege the Chamber of Rehabilitation and free the prisoners" event.

8078.name: Vabbi Veteran
8078.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8140.name: Return to Season 3
8140.requirement: Complete  achievements from the Return to Season 3 event.

8218.name: I Caught a HUGE Fish!
8218.requirement: Turn in a fish of exotic rarity to Shading Willow.

8258.name: Meeting Notes
8258.requirement: Read every document in the Tyrian Alliance meeting area.

8281.name: Island Adventurer
8281.requirement: Speak to Roving Stump about the adventures in Janthir Syntri.

8441.name: Infinite Catapult
8441.requirement: Complete all tasks to unlock the Infinite Catapult.

bits.text: Purchase a catapult token from the skirmish supervisor.
Purchase a catapult mechanism from the skirmish supervisor.
Capture Stonemist Castle without being hit by the castle lord's Meteor Shower ability.
Complete the associated siege expertise achievement.
Purchase catapult parts from the yellow catmander in Desert Borderlands.
Salvage parts from the broken down catapult inside Dreadfall or Ascension Bay.

8475.name: Ursan Ornamented Weapon Collector
8475.requirement: Unlock all  Ursan Ornamented weapon skins by completing events in Lowland Shore or by purchasing them from the Trading Post and binding them to you.

8501.name: Sea-Glass Wave Weapon Collector
8501.requirement: Unlock all  Sea-Glass Wave weapon skins by earning them in Janthir Wilds raids or by purchasing them from specific vendors.

8674.name: Local Response: New Kaineng City
8674.requirement: Complete  events in New Kaineng City. Defeating an ambushing oni rewards extra progress.

8685.name: Rolling Racer: Jormag's Fang (Weekly)
8685.requirement: Complete a lap of the roller beetle race in Snowden Drifts within the time limit. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8696.name: Rolling Ace: Shoreside Sprint
8696.requirement: Complete a lap of the roller beetle race in Southsun Cove within the challenge time limit. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8700.name: Adventurous Spirit: Jade Bot
8700.requirement: Complete any jade bot adventure in Cantha.

8709.name: Ritualist Trainingâ€”Part 2
8709.requirement: Help Kyung with her ritual to calm distressed mursaat spirits.

8758.name: A Titanic Undertaking
8758.description: Bava Nisos is the titan...or vice versa.
8758.requirement: Complete the story chapter A Titanic Undertaking.

8783.name: Frozen Flight
8783.requirement: Complete the Kinfall fractal on any tier.
